title-part.text: SPECIAL FURNITURE, FITTINGS, OR ACCESSORIES FOR SHOPS, STOREHOUSES, BARS, RESTAURANTS OR THE LIKE

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not in the CPC scheme. The subject matter for these IPC groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
A47F1/14 covered by A47B87/0207
A47F1/16 covered by A47F5/0037
A47F1/18 covered by A47F5/0025
A47F3/022 covered by A47F1/06
A47F3/024 covered by A47F1/08
A47F3/026 covered by A47F1/10
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: racks in general A47B; storing means for workshops B25H
show or display aspects A47F3/00; for workshop fittings B25H3/00; containers in general B65D

title-part.text: containers with arrangements for dispensing articles

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. by means of gravity or springs

reference.text: for spring-urged trays or plates B65G1/07

CPC-specific-text.text: for nested articles, e.g. cups, cones
the container being made of tubes or wire
for nested articles, e.g. cups, cones
the container having approximately horizontal tracks of the serpentine type
for nested articles, e.g. cups, cones

title-part.text: dispensing from the side of an approximately horizontal stack

CPC-specific-text.text: for nested articles, e.g. cups, cones
the pushing device being urged by spring means
Devices for lighting, humidifying, heating, ventilation
Devices for protection against sunlight or theft
Cases or cabinets of the counter type
A47F1/04 takes precedence; for cigars or cigarettes A24F15/04; for cigarette papers A24F17/00; for hand towels or toilet paper A47K; for photographic paper G03B
for dispensing bread, buns, confectionary or the like

reference.text: refrigerators F25D; heating arrangements specially adapted for transparent or reflecting areas H05B3/84

Cases or cabinets of the counter type

for charging, displaying or discharging the articles

packing boxes used subsequently as display trays B65D

horizontally adjustable A47B57/58; constructional details of drawers A47B88/90

Shelf extensions, e.g. fixed on price rail
Headers for show stands, shelves, racks or cases

with separate containers rotatable around the pillar

Show stands with clips or slits to attach articles
Suspended show stands, e.g. secured to the ceiling by means of cords or chains

with one compartment or recess for each article
for flat articles, e.g. panels, tiles

title-part.text: Shop, bar, bank or like counters

title-part.text: Check-out counters, e.g. for self-service stores
